anya-e1001n0:7: Āyubbedo manubbedo, gandhabbo ceti te tayo;
anya-e1001n0:10: Gandhabbā gaṇikā ceva, dhanubbedā ca pūraṇā.
anya-e1001n0:11: Tikicchā itihāso ca, jotimāyā ca chandati;
anya-e1001n0:12: Ketumantā ca saddā ca, sippāṭṭhārasakā ime.
anya-e1001n0:15: Daṇḍena nīyate cedaṃ, daṇḍaṃ nayati vā puna;
anya-e1001n0:24: (1) Paṇḍitakaṇḍa. (2) Sujanakaṇḍa. (3) Bāladujjana kaṇḍa. (4) Mittakaṇḍa. (5) Itthikaṇḍa. (6) Rājakaṇḍa. (7) Pakiṇṇaka kaṇḍa-
anya-e1001n0:26: Paṇḍito sujano kaṇḍo, dujjano mittaitthī ca;
anya-e1001n0:37: (1) Paṇḍitakathā. (2) Sambhedakathā. (3) Mittakathā. (4) Nāyaka kathā. (5) Itthikathā
anya-e1001n0:39: Muttaṃ muttaṃ sudassanaṃ, vande bodhivaraṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:40: Nītidha jantūnaṃ sāro, mittācariyā ca pitaro;
anya-e1001n0:43: (1) Ācariyakathā (2) sippakathā (3) paññākathā (4) sutakathā (5) kathānakathā (6) dhanakathā (7) desakathā (8) nissayakathā (9) mittakathā (10) dujjanakathā (11) sujanakathā (12) balakathā (13) itthikathā (14) yuttakathā (15) dāsakathā (16) gharāvāsakathā (17) kātabbakathā (18) akātabbakathā (19) ñātabbakathā (20) alaṅkārakathā (21) rājadhammakathā (22) upasevakakathā (23) dukkhādimissakakathā (24) pakiṇṇakakathā
anya-e1001n0:45: Brahmāti brahmabrahmindo, jino pūretu me bhāvaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:48: Vanditvā ratanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, nissāya pubbake garu;
anya-e1001n0:51: Desañca nissayo mittaṃ, dujjano sujano balaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:52: Itthī putto ca dāso ca, gharāvāso katākato;
anya-e1001n0:56: Sīhā ekaṃ bakā ekaṃ, sikkhe cattāri kukkuṭā;
anya-e1001n0:57: Pañca kākā rājā nāma, cha sunakkhā tīṇi gadrabhā.
anya-e1001n0:59: Mahākammaṃ khuddakaṃ vā, yaṃ kammaṃ kātumicchati;
anya-e1001n0:60: Sabbārambhena kātabbaṃ, sīhā ekaṃ tadā bhave.
anya-e1001n0:66: Thiyā akkamma bhuttañca, sikkhe cattāri kukkuṭo.
anya-e1001n0:72: Daḷhabhatti ca sūrañca, cha etesvānato guṇo.
anya-e1001n0:74: Khinnova vahate bhāraṃ, sītuṇhañca na cintayī;
anya-e1001n0:75: Santuṭṭho ca bhave niccaṃ, tīṇi sikkheyya gadrabhā.
anya-e1001n0:77: Vīsati tāni guṇāni, careyya iha paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n0:78: Vijeyya ripū sabbepi, tejassī so bhavissati.
anya-e1001n0:79: (1) Paṇḍitakaṇḍa (2) sujanakaṇḍa (3) bāladujjanakaṇḍa (4) mittakaṇḍa (5) rājakaṇḍa (6) nāyakakaṇḍa (7) puttakaṇḍa (8) vejjācariyakaṇḍa (9) dāsakakaṇḍa (10) itthikaṇḍa (11) pakiṇṇakakaṇḍa
anya-e1001n0:93: Nīti sāro manussānaṃ, mitto ācariyopi ca;
anya-e1001n0:94: Mātā pitā ca nītimā, sutavā ganthakārako.
anya-e1001n0:96: Alasassa kuto sippaṃ, asippassa kuto dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:97: Adhanassa kuto mittaṃ, amittassa kuto sukhaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:98: Asukhassa kuto puññaṃ, apuññassa kuto varaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:112: Sippasamaṃ dhanaṃ natthi, sippaṃ corā na gaṇhare;
anya-e1001n0:113: Idha loke sippaṃ mittaṃ, paraloke sukhāvahaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:115: Bhuñjanatthaṃ kathanatthaṃ, mukhaṃ hotīti no vade;
anya-e1001n0:116: Yaṃ vātaṃ vā mukhāruḷhaṃ, vacanaṃ paṇḍito naro.
anya-e1001n0:118: Dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e1001n0:122: Upadesaṃ sadā gaṇhe, garuṃ sammā upaṭṭhahaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:124: Upadesaṃ sadā gaṇhe, garuṃ sammā upaṭṭhahaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:138: Paṇḍite ca guṇā sabbe, mūḷhe dosā hi kevalaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:146: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahu.
anya-e1001n0:148: Vijjā dadāti vinayaṃ, vinayā yāti pattataṃ;
anya-e1001n0:149: Pattattā dhanaṃ pappoti, dhanā dhammaṃ tato sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:152: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatiṃ.
anya-e1001n0:155: Attanīva sabbabhūtesu, yo passati so paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n0:160: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e1001n0:168: Kiṃ kulena visālena, guṇahīno tu yo naro;
anya-e1001n0:172: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍitaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:175: Vijjāhīnā na sobhante, niggandhā iva kiṃ sukā.
anya-e1001n0:178: Sūrappabhāya ādāso, chāyaṃ disse na mākare.
anya-e1001n0:186: Mahātejopi tejoyaṃ, mattikaṃ na muduṃ kare;
anya-e1001n0:189: Kottho puttena jātena, yo na vidū na dhammiko;
anya-e1001n0:190: Kāṇena cakkhunā kiṃ vā, cakkhu pīḷeva kevalaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:192: Mudunāva ripuṃ jeti, mudunā jeti dāruṇaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:193: No na siddhaṃ mudu kiñci, tato ca mudunā jaye.
anya-e1001n0:195: Sajāto yena jātena, yāti vaṃso samunnatiṃ;
anya-e1001n0:196: Parivattinisaṃsāre, mato ko vā na jāyate.
anya-e1001n0:198: Dāne tapasi sūre ca, yassa na patthito yaso;
anya-e1001n0:201: Varo eko guṇī putto, na ca mūḷhasatānyapi;
anya-e1001n0:202: Eko cando tamo hanati, na ca tārāgaṇo tathā.
anya-e1001n0:205: Tassa putto bhave vasso, samiddho dhammiko suddhe.
anya-e1001n0:208: Pattetu soḷase vasse, puttaṃ mittaṃva ācare.
anya-e1001n0:210: Lālane bahavo dosā, tālane bahavo guṇā;
anya-e1001n0:211: Tasmā puttañca sissañca, tālaye na tu lālaye.
anya-e1001n0:214: Etesu kovido pañño, dhīro pāḷiṃ visodhaye.
anya-e1001n0:219: Candanaṃ sītalaṃ loke, candikā sītalā tato;
anya-e1001n0:237: Satesu jāyate sūro, sahassesu ca paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n0:238: Vuttā satasahassesu, dātā bhavati vā na vā.
anya-e1001n0:241: Sadese pūjito rājā, vidvā sabbattha pūjito.
anya-e1001n0:244: Asataṃ pana sabbesaṃ, dukkhahetu na saṃsayo.
anya-e1001n0:246: Paṇḍite sujane sante, sabbepi sujanā janā;
anya-e1001n0:250: Vinītaṃ yanti sabbepi, ko taṃ nāseyya paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n0:255: Ambuṃ pivanti no najjo, rukkho khādati no phalaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:256: Megho kvacipi no sassaṃ, paratthāya sataṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:261: Sataṃ pharusavācāhi, na yāti vikatiṃ mano;
anya-e1001n0:262: Tiṇukkāhi na sakkāva, tāpetuṃ sāgare jalaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:264: Selo yathā ekaghano, vātena na samīrati;
anya-e1001n0:271: Anuyyogena telāni, tilehi na sakkā laddhuṃ.
anya-e1001n0:273: Yathā hyekena cakkena, na rathassa pati bhave;
anya-e1001n0:274: Evaṃ purisakārena, vinā kammaṃ na sijjhati.
anya-e1001n0:276: Uyyāmena hi sijjhanti, kāriyāni na manorathaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:277: Na hi suttassa sīhassa, pavisanti migāmukhe.
anya-e1001n0:282: Mātā sattu pitā verī, yena bālo na pāṭhito;
anya-e1001n0:283: Na sobhate sabhāmajjhe, haṃsamajjhe bako yathā.
anya-e1001n0:295: Byasanena ca mūḷhānaṃ, nidāya kalahena vā.
anya-e1001n0:299: Niddāsīlī sabhāsīlī, anuṭṭhātā ca yo naro;
anya-e1001n0:303: Na hi saṃharate jutiṃ, cando caṇḍālavesme.
anya-e1001n0:305: Yatra vidvajjano natthi, sīlāghyo tatra appadhipi;
anya-e1001n0:308: Ṭhānabhaṭṭhā na sobhante, dantā kesā nakhā narā;
anya-e1001n0:319: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
anya-e1001n0:322: Khippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n0:324: Dullabho purisājañño, na so sabbattha jāyati;
anya-e1001n0:325: Yattha so jāyatī dhīro, taṃ kulaṃ sukha medhati.
anya-e1001n0:331: Bhattaṃ ukkhaliyaṃ pakkaṃ, bhājanepi tathā bhave.
anya-e1001n0:339: Sele sele na maṇikaṃ, gaje gaje na muttikaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:340: Vane vane na candanaṃ, ṭhāne ṭhāne na paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n0:342: Paṇḍito sutasampanno, yattha atthīti ce suto;
anya-e1001n0:345: Potthakesu ca yaṃ sippaṃ, parahatthesu yaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:346: Yathākicce samuppanne, na taṃ sippaṃ na taṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:348: Uppalena jalaṃ jaññā, kiriyāya kulaṃ naro;
anya-e1001n0:355: Appassuto sutaṃ appaṃ, bahuṃ maññati mānavā;
anya-e1001n0:358: Paṭhame sippaṃ gaṇheyya, eseyya dutiye dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:359: Careyya tatiye dhammaṃ, esā janāna dhammatā.
anya-e1001n0:362: Paññāya atthaṃ jānāti, attho ñāto sukhāvaho.
anya-e1001n0:364: Natthi vijjāsamaṃ mittaṃ, na ca byādhisamo ripu;
anya-e1001n0:365: Na ca atthasamaṃ pemaṃ, na ca kammasamaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:367: Vinā satthaṃ na gaccheyya, sūro saṅgāmabhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:376: Haṃso majjhe na kākānaṃ, sīho gunnaṃ na sobhate;
anya-e1001n0:380: Attānurūpakaṃ kodhaṃ, yo jānāti sa paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n0:383: Appapūro ghaṭo khobhe, appakhīrā gāvī cale.
anya-e1001n0:385: Na titti rājā dhanamhi, paṇḍitopi subhāsite;
anya-e1001n0:386: Cakkhupi piyadassane, na titti sāgaro jale.
anya-e1001n0:391: Yo sisso sippalobhena, bahuṃ gaṇhāti taṃ sippaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:392: Mūgova supinaṃ passaṃ, kathetumpi na ussahe.
anya-e1001n0:394: Na bhijjetuṃ kumbhakāro, sobhetuṃ kumbha ghaṭati;
anya-e1001n0:401: Vāsitaṃ kānanaṃ sabbaṃ, suputtena kulaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n0:403: Iṇakattā pitā sattu, mātā ca byabhicārinī;
anya-e1001n0:404: Bhariyā rūpavatī sattu, putto sattu apaṇḍito.
anya-e1001n0:417: Paccuppannañca yo dhammaṃ, tattha tattha vipassati;
anya-e1001n0:420: Chandā dosā bhayā mohā, yo dhammaṃ nātivattati;
anya-e1001n0:426: Dullabhaṃ pākatikaṃ vākyaṃ, dullabho khemakaro suto;
anya-e1001n0:427: Dullabhā sadisī jāyā, dullabho sajano piyo.
anya-e1001n0:435: Apuṭṭho paṇḍito bherī, pajjunno hoti pucchito;
anya-e1001n0:436: Bālo puṭṭho apuṭṭho ca, bahuṃ vikatthate sadā.
anya-e1001n0:440: Cakkhumāssa yathā andho, sotavā badhiro yathā;
anya-e1001n0:445: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:450: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇābhiyyo na maññati;
anya-e1001n0:451: Karaṃ purisakiccāni, so sukhaṃ na vihāyati.
anya-e1001n0:453: Yasmiṃdese na sammāno, na piyo na ca bandhavo;
anya-e1001n0:454: Na ca vijjāgamo koci, na tattha divasaṃ vase.
anya-e1001n0:456: Dhanavā sutavā rājā, nadī vajjo ime pañca;
anya-e1001n0:457: Yattha dese na vijjanti, na tattha divasaṃ vase.
anya-e1001n0:459: Nabhassa bhūsanaṃ cando, nārīnaṃ bhūsanaṃ pati;
anya-e1001n0:460: Chamāya bhūsanaṃ rājā, vijjā sabbassa bhūsanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:462: Sukhatthiko sace vijjaṃ, vijjatthiko caje sukhaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:463: Sukhatthino kuto vijjā, kuto vijjatthino sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:466: Khaṇacāge kuto vijjā, kaṇacāge kato dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:471: Dhammo jaye no adhammo, saccaṃ jayati nāsaccaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:472: Khamā jayati no kodho, devo jayati nāsūro.
anya-e1001n0:474: Hatthassa bhūsanaṃ dānaṃ, saccaṃ kaṇṭhassa bhūsanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:475: Sotassa bhūsanaṃ satthaṃ, bhūsane kiṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:477: Videsetu dhanaṃ vijjā, byasanesu dhanaṃ mati;
anya-e1001n0:478: Paraloke dhanaṃ dhammo, sīlaṃ sabbattha ve dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:480: Padose dīpako cando, pabhāte dīpako ravi;
anya-e1001n0:484: Na hi vañjhā vijānāti, guruṃ pasavavedanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:486: Yassa natthi sayaṃ paññā, satthaṃ tassa karoti kiṃ;
anya-e1001n0:489: Kiṃ karissanti vattāro, sotaṃ yattha na vijjate;
anya-e1001n0:495: Natthi attasamaṃ pemaṃ, natthi dhaññasamaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:496: Natthi paññāsamā ābhā, vuṭṭhi ve paramā sarā.
anya-e1001n0:501: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano;
anya-e1001n0:502: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, dhīro saddhaṃ nivesaye.
anya-e1001n0:504: Guṇo seṭṭhaṅgataṃ yāti, na ucce sayane vase;
anya-e1001n0:505: Pāsādasikhare vāso, kāko kiṃ garuḷo siyā.
anya-e1001n0:508: Āgatañca bhayaṃ disvā, abhīto hoti paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n0:511: Malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṃ, pamādo rakkhato malaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:513: Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṃ thokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
anya-e1001n0:516: Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade;
anya-e1001n0:520: Pantho ca saṅgāmo titthaṃ, aṭṭhete parivajjiyā.
anya-e1001n0:522: Rattoduṭṭho ca muḷho ca, mānī luddho tathālaso;
anya-e1001n0:523: Ekacintī ca bālo ca, ete atthavināsakā.
anya-e1001n0:525: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca, bhīru āmisagaruko;
anya-e1001n0:526: Itthī soṇḍo paṇḍako ca, navamo dārakopi ca.
anya-e1001n0:528: Navate puggalā loke, ittarā calitā calā;
anya-e1001n0:529: Etehi mantitaṃ guyhaṃ, khippaṃ bhavati pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:531: Yo niruttiṃ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:532: Pade pade vikaṅkheyya, vane andhagajo yathā.
anya-e1001n0:546: Nāgo gato naramukhe na jahāti līḷaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:551: Āhāre byavahāre ca, cattalajjo sadā bhave.
anya-e1001n0:556: Jaheyya pāpake mitte, bhajeyya paṇḍite jane;
anya-e1001n0:560: Yādisaṃ vappate bījaṃ, tādisaṃ harate phalaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:562: Chando nidānaṃ gāthānaṃ, akkharā tāsaṃ viyañjanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:565: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ hitamattano;
anya-e1001n0:568: Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena sahasaṃvase;
anya-e1001n0:571: Nayaṃ nayati medhāvī, adhurāyaṃ na yuñjati;
anya-e1001n0:572: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1001n0:573: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
anya-e1001n0:589: Tathā sakalavijjānaṃ, dhammassa ca dhanassa ca.
anya-e1001n0:591: Paṇḍitā dukkhaṃ patvāna, na bhavanti visādino;
anya-e1001n0:592: Pavissa rāhuno mukhaṃ, kiṃ no deti puna sasī.
anya-e1001n0:594: Javena assaṃ jānanti, vāhena ca balibaddhaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:597: Manasā cintitaṃ kammaṃ, vacasā na pakāsaye;
anya-e1001n0:600: Anabhyāse visaṃ vijjā, ajiṇṇe bhojanaṃ visaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:601: Visaṃ sabhā daliddassa, vuddhassa taruṇī visaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:602: Cattāro pañca ālope, ābhutvā udakaṃ pive;
anya-e1001n0:605: Yassa eso pasutopi, guṇavā pujjate naro;
anya-e1001n0:615: Na vade dakādī natthīti, mukhe ca vacanaṃ tathā.
anya-e1001n0:617: Sabbaṃ suṇāti sotena, sabbaṃ passati cakkhunā;
anya-e1001n0:618: Na ca diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ dhīro, sabbaṃ uccitu marahati.
anya-e1001n0:623: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ attamattano;
anya-e1001n0:624: Yoniso vicine dhammaṃ, evaṃ tattha visujjhati.
anya-e1001n0:627: Ārohati na yo saka-vaṃsaagge dhajo yathā.
anya-e1001n0:635: Narattaṃ dullabhaṃ loke, vijjā tatra sudullabhā;
anya-e1001n0:636: Kavittaṃ dullabhaṃ tatra, satti tatra sudullabhā.
anya-e1001n0:645: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:646: Yassa ete dhanā atthi, itthiyā purisassa vā;
anya-e1001n0:647: Adaliddoti taṃ āhu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:652: Sataṃ saddhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
anya-e1001n0:672: Sītalaṃ yadi naraggi, pabbatagge ca uppalaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:687: Sunakho sunakhaṃ disvā, dantaṃ dasseti hiṃsituṃ;
anya-e1001n0:690: Na ca vegena kiccāni, kattabbāni kudācanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:702: Satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hotiappiyo.
anya-e1001n0:707: Na visaṃ visamiccāha, dhanaṃ saṅghassa uccate;
anya-e1001n0:708: Visaṃ ekaṃva hanati, hanati saṅghassa sabbaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:711: Bahuṃapi asādhūnaṃ, na ca vāriva aṇṇave.
anya-e1001n0:713: Apattheyyaṃ na pattheyya, acinteyyaṃ na cintaye;
anya-e1001n0:714: Dhammameva sucinteyya, kālaṃ moghaṃ na icchaye.
anya-e1001n0:717: Na hi cintāmayā bhogā, itthiyā purisassa vā.
anya-e1001n0:719: Asantassa piyo hoti, sante na kurute piyaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:720: Asataṃ dhammaṃ roceti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:722: Guṇā kubbanti dūtattaṃ, dūrepi vasataṃ sataṃ;
anya-e1001n0:723: Ketake gandhaṃ ghāyitvā, gacchanti bhamarā sayaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:736: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno;
anya-e1001n0:737: Attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye.
anya-e1001n0:739: Bālo vā yadi vā vuddho, yuvā vā gehamāgato;
anya-e1001n0:752: Atipiyo na kātabbo, khalo kotuhalaṃ karo;
anya-e1001n0:755: Sappo duṭṭho khalo duṭṭho, sappā duṭṭhataro khalo;
anya-e1001n0:758: Yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ, paṇḍito vāpi tenaso;
anya-e1001n0:759: Bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve bāloti vuccati.
anya-e1001n0:761: Madhūva maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
anya-e1001n0:762: Yadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, atha dukkhaṃ nigacchati.
anya-e1001n0:764: Na sādhu balavā bālo, sāhasā vindate dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:767: Ghare duṭṭho mūsiko ca, vane duṭṭho ca vānaro;
anya-e1001n0:768: Sakuṇe ca duṭṭho kāko, nareduṭṭho ca brāhmaṇo.
anya-e1001n0:770: Dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:776: Nattadosaṃ pare jaññā, jaññā dosaṃ parassatu;
anya-e1001n0:782: Yathā udumbarapakkā, bahi rattakā eva ca;
anya-e1001n0:786: Na so dhammaṃ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n0:789: Ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
anya-e1001n0:794: Dujjanena samaṃ veraṃ, sakhyañcāpi na kāraye;
anya-e1001n0:795: Uṇho dahati caṅgāro, sīto kaṇhāyate karaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:798: Madhu tiṭṭhati jivhagge, hadaye halāhalaṃ visaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:801: Maṇinā bhūsito sappo, kimeso na bhayaṅkaro.
anya-e1001n0:806: Yathāpi pana sapakkā, bahi kaṇṭakameva ca;
anya-e1001n0:815: Upadeso hi mūḷhānaṃ, pakopāya na santiyā.
anya-e1001n0:817: Na ṭhātabbaṃ na gantabbaṃ, dujjanena samaṃ kvaci;
anya-e1001n0:818: Dujjano hi dukkhaṃ deti, na so sukhaṃ kadācipi.
anya-e1001n0:820: Abaddhā tattha bajjhanti, yattha bālā pabhāsare;
anya-e1001n0:821: Baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsare.
anya-e1001n0:833: Hitakkaro paro bandhu, bandhupi ahito paro;
anya-e1001n0:846: Rājadvāre susāne ca, yo tiṭṭhati so bandhavā.
anya-e1001n0:848: Na 2 vissase amittassa, mittañcāpi na vissase;
anya-e1001n0:851: Mātā mittaṃ pitā ceti, sabhāvā taṃ tayaṃ hitaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:854: Āpadāsu mittaṃ jaññā, yuddhe sūraṃ iṇe suciṃ;
anya-e1001n0:855: Bhariyaṃ khīṇesu vittesu, byasanesu ca bandhavaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:857: Sakiṃ duṭṭhañca yo mittaṃ, puna sandhātumicchati;
anya-e1001n0:861: Punappunaṃ vivaḍḍhanti, tasmā sesaṃ na kāraye.
anya-e1001n0:864: Tādisaṃ no paseveyya, hadaye tu halāhalaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:866: Na seve pharusaṃ sāmiṃ, na ca seveyya macchariṃ;
anya-e1001n0:867: Tato apaggaṇha sāmiṃ, neva niggahitaṃ tato.
anya-e1001n0:875: Ahitā paṭisedho ca, hitesu ca payojanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:878: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n0:879: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n0:881: Piyo garu bhāva nīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n0:882: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako.
anya-e1001n0:890: Piyo garu bhāvaniyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n0:891: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, na caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n0:893: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n0:894: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n0:898: Mahājanaṃ yo rañjeti, catūhipi vatthūhi vā;
anya-e1001n0:899: Rājāti vuccate loke, iti sallakkhaye vidvā.
anya-e1001n0:904: Kariyacariyasusaṅgahaṃ bahūnaṃ, anavamatena guṇena yāti saggaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:905: Dānañca peyyavajjañca, atthacariyā ca yā idha;
anya-e1001n0:906: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:907: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
anya-e1001n0:909: Dānaṃ sīlaṃ pariccāgaṃ, ajjavaṃ maddavaṃ tapaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:913: Ekayāmaṃ saye rājā, dviyā maññeva paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n0:916: Aputtakaṃ gharaṃ suññaṃ, raṭṭhaṃ suññaṃ arājakaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:923: Dubbalassa balaṃ rājā, kumārānaṃ rudaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:926: Nāyakassa guṇā ete, icchitabbā sataṃ sadā.
anya-e1001n0:929: Sakiṃ sappurisā loke, esa dhammo sanantano.
anya-e1001n0:934: Yo paṇḍito kodhano taṃ na sādhu.
anya-e1001n0:936: Āyaṃ khayaṃ sayaṃ jaññā, katākataṃ sayaṃ jaññā;
anya-e1001n0:939: Mātā puttakataṃ pāpaṃ, sissakataṃ guru tathā;
anya-e1001n0:942: Akkodhena jine kodhaṃ, asādhuṃ sādhunā jine;
anya-e1001n0:953: Na raññā samakaṃ bhuñje, kāmabhogaṃ kudācanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:957: Na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti samako;
anya-e1001n0:958: Eso sāmiko mayhanti, citte niṭṭhaṃ saṇṭhāpaye.
anya-e1001n0:961: Ujuke nātininne ca, na bhaje uccamāsane;
anya-e1001n0:962: Cha dose vajje sevako, aggīva saṃyato tiṭṭhe.
anya-e1001n0:963: Na pacchato na purato, nāpi āsannadūrato;
anya-e1001n0:964: Na kacche nopi paṭivāte, na cāpi oṇatuṇṇate;
anya-e1001n0:965: Ime dose vivajjetvā, ekamantaṃ ṭhitā ahu –
anya-e1001n0:972: Kassako vāṇijo macco, samaṇo sutasīla vā;
anya-e1001n0:978: Mahārukkhassa phalino, āmaṃ chindati yo phalaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:984: Mahārukkhassa phalino, pakkaṃ chindati yo phalaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:994: Gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ gacchati puṅgavo;
anya-e1001n0:995: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃ yanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
anya-e1001n0:998: So sace dhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā.
anya-e1001n0:999: Gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ gacchati puṅgavo;
anya-e1001n0:1000: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃyanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
anya-e1001n0:1002: So sace dhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
anya-e1001n0:1003: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti dhammiko.
anya-e1001n0:1013: Avajātaṃ na icchanti, yo hoti kulagandhano.
anya-e1001n0:1016: Bhato vā no bharissati, kiccaṃ vā no karissati.
anya-e1001n0:1019: Atha vā pana petānaṃ, dakkhinaṃ anupadassati.
anya-e1001n0:1021: Bahuputte pitā eko, avassaṃ poseti sadā;
anya-e1001n0:1024: Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ duṭṭhu, anusāseyya no jahe;
anya-e1001n0:1025: Kinnu chejjaṃ karaṃ pādaṃ, littaṃ asucinā siyā.
anya-e1001n0:1043: Rujāya jayalakkhaṇaṃ, raso ca bhesajjampi ca;
anya-e1001n0:1054: Tathā viññūhi viññeyyā, mittadārā ca bandhavā.
anya-e1001n0:1057: Āsā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e1001n0:1058: Sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā;
anya-e1001n0:1059: Tasmā tāyo hitvāna, brūheyya vivekaṃ sudhī.
anya-e1001n0:1060: Āsā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e1001n0:1061: Sāratthā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā;
anya-e1001n0:1064: Loke hi aṅganā nāma, kodhanā mittabhedikā;
anya-e1001n0:1067: Yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
anya-e1001n0:1068: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, nāsaṃ kujjhanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1001n0:1070: Sabbā nadī vaṅkagatī, sabbe kaṭṭhamayā vanā;
anya-e1001n0:1074: Tasmā ghatañca aggiñca, nekatra ṭhapaye budho.
anya-e1001n0:1076: Itthīnañca dhanaṃ rūpaṃ, purisānaṃ vijjā dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:1077: Bhikkhūnañca dhanaṃ sīlaṃ, rājānañca dhanaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:1085: Dvitipati nārī ceva, vihāradviti bhikkhu ca;
anya-e1001n0:1088: Ratti vinā na candimā, vīcivinā ca sāgaro;
anya-e1001n0:1091: Asantuṭṭhā yatī naṭṭhā, santuṭṭhāpi ca patthi vā;
anya-e1001n0:1092: Salajjā gaṇikā naṭṭhā, nillajjā ca kulitthiyo.
anya-e1001n0:1103: Itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa janādhipa;
anya-e1001n0:1112: Āsīvisampi āsīde, yena daṭṭho na jīvati;
anya-e1001n0:1113: Na tveva eko ekāya, mātugāmena sallape.
anya-e1001n0:1115: Na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n0:1116: Itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, tattha tattha vicakkhaṇā.
anya-e1001n0:1118: Na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n0:1122: Sītakāle bhave uṇhaṃ, uṇhakāle ca sītalaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:1133: Kappo byākaraṇaṃ joti – satthaṃ sikkhā nirutti ca;
anya-e1001n0:1143: Dhīro yathātthavādī ca, esa dūto vidhīyate.
anya-e1001n0:1146: Sūro ca kathino ceva, sūpakāro sa vuccate.
anya-e1001n0:1149: Appamādī sadā dakkho, patīhāro sa uccate.
anya-e1001n0:1151: Itthimisse kuto sīlaṃ, maṃsabhakkhe kuto dayā;
anya-e1001n0:1152: Surāpāne kuto saccaṃ, mahālobhe kuto lajjā;
anya-e1001n0:1153: Mahātande kuto sippaṃ, mahākodhe kuto dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n0:1165: Tasmā hi mātāpitūva, mānaye sakkareyya ca.
anya-e1001n0:1167: Yathā mātā pitā bhātā, aññevāpi ca ñātakā;
anya-e1001n0:1168: Gāvo no paramā mittā, yāsu jāyanti osadhā.
anya-e1001n0:1170: Annadā baladā cetā, vaṇṇadā sukhadā tathā;
anya-e1001n0:1171: Etamatthavasaṃ ñatvā, nāsu gāvo haniṃsu te.
anya-e1001n0:1173: Ye ca khādanti gomaṃsaṃ, mātumaṃsaṃva khādare;
anya-e1001n0:1174: Matesu tesu gijjhānaṃ, dade sote ca vāhaye.
anya-e1001n0:1191: Garahā ca pasaṃsā ca, aniccā tāvakālikā;
anya-e1001n0:1199: Dvino dviveka sākamhi, tamhi jātena jātiyā;
anya-e1001n0:1214: Tiṭṭhataṃ ayaṃ me gantho, susāro yāva sāsanaṃ;
anya-e1001n0:1233: Pupphanti asanadumā, vāyanti kānane hi ve.
anya-e1001n0:1237: Yathāpi rammako māso, gimhānaṃ hoti brāhmaṇa;
anya-e1001n0:1255: Vikhyāto lakkhañño ceva, jeṭṭhena saṃyuto hi ve.
anya-e1001n0:1263: Āsāḷho nāma māsopi, atīva visiṭṭho bhavi;
anya-e1001n0:1264: Paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi buddho, tasmiñhi muni sudhī.
anya-e1001n0:1276: Khe savaṇanakkhattampi, atīva jotayī hi ve.
anya-e1001n0:1288: Megho thokaṃ thokaṃ himaṃ, vassati patatipi ca.
anya-e1001n0:1312: Pupphanti tamhi māsamhi, himapāto ahosi ca.
anya-e1001n0:1314: Vīhayo honti pakkā ca, khettesu mranamābhūtale;
anya-e1001n0:1340: Dakkhiṇadesato tamhi, vāto pavāyati hi ve;
anya-e1001n0:1344: Tena sabbampi vipinaṃ, vicittaṃ dassaniyañhi ve.
